# Lecture 13: Arrays and Objects
---

Welcome to Lecture 13. Here is a brief breakdown of today's class.

#### Learning Objectives
---
1. What are loops and how can we use them to handle dynamic data?
2. What are objects and how are they useful in "modeling" real world things in javascript?

#### Final Projects
---

**5 mins** Let's go over wireframes!

#### Rundown
---
Ok, game time.

#### [Warmup](https://fewdmaterials.github.io/FEWD629_Lecture12/)
Do two problems from our perpetual list of psets
#### [Arrays and Objects](#arrays-and-objects)

desc.content: An introduction to the array and hash table data structures

arrays-and-objects.content:
# Arrays and Objects
---
In this section, we will learn about two non trivial computer science structs: **arrays** and **objects**.

## [JS Global Notes](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_arrays_and_objects) | [LIVE Instructor View](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_arrays_and_objects)

#### Learning Objectives
---
1. What are loops and how can we use them to handle dynamic data?
2. What are objects and how are they useful in "modeling" real world things in javascript?

#### Exercise
---

First, let's solve this arrays pset.

#### [Arrays PSET](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Arrays_PSET) | [LIVE Instructor View](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/Arrays_PSET)
Try to complete all of these.

#### [Objects PSET](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Objects_PSET) | [LIVE Instructor View](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/Objects_PSET)
Just one problem!


#### Arrays
---

Some important array methods:

1. push
2. pop
3. shift
4. unshift

Also, **wth** is a method anyways??

#### Objects
---

Can be used to model real world things in javascript
